akn:section.akn:heading: Service requirements for qualified members of engine departments

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7314. Service requirements for qualified members of engine departments To qualify for an endorsement as qualified member of the engine department, an applicant must provide proof that the applicant has 6 months’ service in the related entry rating as described in section 7313(b) of this title. (Pub. L. 98–89, Aug. 26, 1983, 97 Stat. 544.)
Historical and Revision Notes

Section 7314 requires individuals who wish to have their documents endorsed as a qualified member of the engine department must have at least 6 months service as a wiper or coal passer.
